description.fr:
{%FightStarted} Ajoute une {Spell:259} à votre main.
\---
{%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Pose une {ObjectMechanism:1058} autour<sprite name="cell_around"> d'un adversaire.
description.en:
{%FightStarted} Adds one {Spell:259} to your hand.
\---
{%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Places one {ObjectMechanism:1058} around <sprite name="cell_around"> an opponent.
description.es:
{%FightStarted} Añade el hechizo {Spell:259} a tu mano.
\---
{%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Pone una {ObjectMechanism:1058} alrededor<sprite name="cell_around"> de un adversario.
description.de:
{%FightStarted} Fügt deiner Hand den Zauber „{Spell:259}“ hinzu.
\---
{%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Platziert eine {ObjectMechanism:1058} im Umkreis\_<sprite name="cell_around"> eines Gegners.
description.pt:
{%FightStarted} Adiciona uma {Spell:259} à sua mão.
\---
{%FightTurnEndedMonsters} Coloca uma {ObjectMechanism:1058} em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de um adversário.
